cells.data:
Trying to build the mask and have run into a problem. I am getting this when trying to add a loop cut:



Instead  of getting this (from the video tutorial):



For some reason, the loop cut is not going all the way around. Have decided the trash the mask and start over.

Redid the mask and worked better this time:

This was done the same way as the face. Add a circle, cut off half the vertices, mirror it and build from there.



1 hour to do this with a total now of 5 hours and 36 minutes

Once again using a circle which I cut in half and put back together with a mirror modifier, I start to build the rest of the masks by extruding points around the head.



Continuing with the process in the same way:



Final outline completed:


Now, starting to add faces (select two edges and press ‘F’ to the structure I have built.
2 hours on this,  7 hours 11 minutes total.



Roughed in lower mask completed:

Total time: 7:56


Ok, now to work on the top of the head. Selecting two points on the cure and connect them together with ‘F’ (face).



Subdivide the line and make the shape of the head…
